title: Our constitution
creator_credit: Krishna Gopal, M. Bhavnani and Documentary Films of India
brief_description: The spirit of the Indian constitution and the institutions of Indian government. The Federal and State legislatures; how they are elected; how they function; the fields in which they may legislate; the President, Prime Minister, Compotroller and Auditor-General; Union Public Service Commission and Electoral Commission; independence of the judiciary; the citizens’ rights; Indian democracy.
